description:
☢️ FALLOUT — Season 2 Official Trailer (2025) | Prime Video 🌵
The wasteland just got wilder. Fallout returns, and it’s heading to New Vegas. Brace yourself for radioactive action, twisted loyalties, and familiar faces in this explosive Season 2 trailer, arriving on Prime Video in December 2025.

:::Cast & Characters:::
Lucy MacLean — Ella Purnell
The Ghoul / Cooper Howard — Walton Goggins
Maximus — Aaron Moten
Hank MacLean — Kyle MacLachlan
Norm — Moisés Arias
Mysterious Newcomer — Macaulay Culkin

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.

FALLOUT Season 2 Official Trailer (2025) Prime Video
Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.
